Calllog - Class in Car
is the component responsible of communicating with the Symbian C++ calllog daemon.
Calllog(driverMidlet) - Constructor for class Car.Calllog
the constructor initilaize noCall to 0 and callDur to 0 and finish to false.
calllogaquire() - Method in class Car.driverMidlet
calls calllogdaemon.startcalllog() in a new thread to prevent blocking the current thread.
calllogdaemon - Variable in class Car.driverMidlet
capture user number and duration of calls while he/she is driving.
calllogrecive() - Method in class Car.driverMidlet
calls calllogdaemon.endcalllog() in a new thread to prevent blocking the current thread.
canStart - Variable in class Car.driverMidlet
check whether we can start the application.
